page.title: 16OUR MILKMAN
page.content: The milkman in our area has a very large round.He comes from the Northwood branch of Express Dairies.The milkman seems to get on well with his customers.Milk has just recently gone up in price and a lot of people were annoyed by this.The milkman has a hard job,wich people seem to take for granted.Sometimes he will start at five in the morning and not finish until two in the afternoon.The van he works with is terrible but they can not afford a new one.The milkman has to put up with a lot of unecessary complaints.At the end of the day the milkman still has to count up his books and load the van for the next day.It is a very hard job.
